name: SWORDCAR
description:
SWORDCAR is an automotive combat game with a fresh coat of gore. Master physics based combat, pull off eviscerating drifts and cast punishing spells in this unique CAR-acter action game.



Those A-Holes at BUSY CORP are at it again. It's time to rip off their grubby fingers and release their parasitic clutch on SWORDCITY. Liberate humanity with a two-ton sword that THRIVES on the blood of the soulless busymen. Crush the hellish company metropolis and put your blade to the CEO.




Leave a trail of limbs in your wake employing a wide range of cars, medieval weaponry and diabolical BLOOD MAGIK. Terrifying gore powered machines will hunt you down every step of the way.
